gr.fire.browser.util
Class Response

java.lang.Object
  gr.fire.browser.util.Response

public class Response
extends java.lang.Object

This method wraps a request made with the HttpClient. It can handle both requests to local files (in recordstore or the jar file) as well as requests to external resource via http.

Author:
padeler
